column4: hi, ubuntu.  I'm getting a LOT of error emails about "unable to load mhash.so".  I found some google docs about deleting /etc/php5/conf.d/mhash.ini.  it didn't help.
they'll just tell you to use python or something here
i asked about gnome2 and just got nonsense
- well did you sweet talk them first by saying thank you for all the great advice with the last problem you had?
